mutants.code:
def maximize_happiness(n, happiness_values):
    happiness_values.sort(reverse=True)
    max_happiness = 1
    step_count = 1
    current_sum = 0
    remaining_sum = 0
    for value in happiness_values:
        current_sum += value
        if current_sum * step_count > max_happiness:
            max_happiness = current_sum * step_count
            step_count += 1
        else:
            remaining_sum += value
    return max_happiness + remaining_sum

    happiness_values.sort(reverse=True)
    max_happiness = 0
